properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 10 at 4:34PM CST until January 11 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Tulsa OK
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation
expected. Total snow accumulations of one to three inches and
ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch are possible.
Winds gusting as high as 40 mph.
For the Winter Storm Watch,
heavy snow still remains possible. Total snow accumulations of 2
to 5 inches possible within an narrow band. Uncertainty remains
on where this band sets up and watch continues along with the
advisory.

* WHERE...Osage, Washington OK and Pawnee Counties.

* WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 9 PM this evening
to 6 AM CST Saturday. For the Winter Storm Watch, Saturday
morning.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

For the latest road conditions call 1-844-465-4997 or go to
okRoads.org.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT SATURDAY MORNING
